SUMMARY.HEADING: About Me
SUMMARY.LINE1: Experienced Fullstack Developer with over 5 years in the industry.
SUMMARY.LINE2: Proficient in building scalable web applications using Angular, Node.js, and modern technologies.
SUMMARY.LINE3: Strong background in both frontend and backend development.
SUMMARY.LINE4: Passionate about clean code, best practices, and continuous learning.
SUMMARY.LINE5: Currently focused on delivering high-quality, user-centric solutions.

EXP1.TITLE: Senior Fullstack Developer
EXP1.ACHIEVEMENT1: Led the development of a scalable SaaS platform used by 10,000+ users.
EXP1.ACHIEVEMENT2: Implemented CI/CD pipelines, reducing deployment time by 40%.
EXP1.ACHIEVEMENT3: Mentored a team of 5 junior developers and improved code quality.
EXP1.ACHIEVEMENT4: Collaborated with cross-functional teams to deliver projects on time.

EXP2.TITLE: Software Engineer
EXP2.ACHIEVEMENT1: Developed RESTful APIs and integrated third-party services.
EXP2.ACHIEVEMENT2: Optimized database queries, improving performance by 30%.
EXP2.ACHIEVEMENT3: Contributed to frontend features using Angular and React.

PROJ1.NAME: Online Resume Builder
PROJ1.DESC: A web app to create, customize, and export professional resumes.

PROJ2.NAME: Task Manager API
PROJ2.DESC: RESTful API for managing tasks, users, and authentication.

PROJ3.NAME: Portfolio Website
PROJ3.DESC: Personal portfolio to showcase projects, skills, and experience.

summary.name: Anis Rouis
summary.title: Full stack web developer
summary.profile: Fullstack Web Developer with hands-on experience in Angular & Django, specialized in building medical and CRM platforms. Strong background in responsive front-end development, back-office systems, and third-party integrations (e.g., social media APIs, email services).
